name: Yuurei Project
description:
First Group Project made in the AGDD Course at Reykjavík University

Play together as ethereal beings trying to get through a treacherous Castle.

Player 1 Controls:

AD for Left and Right Movement

W to Jump

S (while inside the purple areas) to turn into an ethereal being that when still is essentially a platform to assist your friends.

Player 2 Controls:

JL for Left and Right Movement

I to Jump

K (while inside the purple areas) to turn into an ethereal being that when still is essentially a platform to assist your friends.

Help your friend through each level and try to beat the game within the time limit!
